sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
    'select *, ''', 
    pipeline().parameters.datasource, 
    ''' as datasource from ', 
    pipeline().parameters.tablename, 
    ' where ', 
    pipeline().parameters.watermark, 
    ' >= ''', 
    activity('fetch_logs_copy1').output.value[0].last_fetched_date,
    ''''
)

query.value:
@concat(
    'INSERT INTO audit.load_logs (data_source, tablename, numberofrowscopied, watermarkcolumnname, loaddate) VALUES (''',
    pipeline().parameters.datasource, ''', ''',
    pipeline().parameters.tablename, ''', ',
    activity('Copy data1_copy1').output.rowscopied, ', ''',
    pipeline().parameters.watermark, ''', ''',
    utcNow(), ''')'
)

@concat(
    'INSERT INTO audit.load_logs (data_source, tablename, numberofrowscopied, watermarkcolumnname, loaddate) VALUES (''',
    pipeline().parameters.datasource, ''', ''',
    pipeline().parameters.tablename, ''', ',
    activity('fulldata_copy_copy1').output.rowscopied, ', ''',
    pipeline().parameters.watermark, ''', ''',
    utcNow(), ''')'
)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
    'select *, ''', 
    item().datasource, 
    ''' as datasource from ', 
    item().tablename, 
    ' where ', 
    item().watermark, 
    ' >= ''', 
    activity('fetch_logs').output.value[0].last_fetched_date,
    ''''
)

query.value:
@concat(
    'insert into audit.load_logs(data_source, tablename, numberofrowscopied, watermarkcolumnname, loaddate) values (''',
    item().datasource, ''', ''', 
    item().tablename, ''', ', 
    activity('Copy data1').output.rowscopied, ', ''', 
    item().watermark, ''', ''', 
    utcNow(), ''')'
)

@concat(
    'INSERT INTO audit.load_logs (data_source, tablename, numberofrowscopied, watermarkcolumnname, loaddate) VALUES (''',
    item().datasource, ''', ''',
    item().tablename, ''', ',
    activity('fulldata_copy').output.rowscopied, ', ''',
    item().watermark, ''', ''',
    utcNow(), ''')'
)
